attributes.action: spouses who look after their partner till death loose everything over night
attributes.additional_details:
Did You Know when carers spouses die . they are no longer entitled to anything ? overnight !!! .they know longer have a wife or husband , they loose their income, they loose the car and in HA they loose their home too.
these unsung Heros give up their own lives, interests, Friends ,freedom their careers . and oftern sacrifice their own health. for their partner. Yet when their partners die they get nothing overnight.
they are made to go out and get a job ,home and transport all while coping with their personal loss. Its time the government looked at their dirty secret
 "spent Carers"
provide these angels with a pension and give them time to get their lives back together before you take everything from them. they saved you millions
